titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir Anthony Ashley Cooper, Thomas Scot, Io. Berners and Iohn Weaver, Esquiers delivered to the Lord Fleetwood : owning their late actions in endeavouring to secure the Tower of London, and expostulating his Lordships defection from his engagement unto the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.
